featured.text: What does Zeke Emanuel have in mind when saying “What did Mom put in the cereal?” (A)
What does Zeke Emanuel think of the modern conveniences mentioned in the interview? (A)
Isn’t writing a book about how great your family is a bit odd? Zeke:
Which of the following best summarizes Zeke Emanuel’s response to the last question?
According to Zeke Emanuel, which of the following is a reason for the brothers’ success? (A)

definition.zh_def: 一種男性名字，通常是以希伯來語的雅各為根源的變體。
definition.en_def: A male given name, often a variant of Jacob in Hebrew.
definition.example: Zeke is planning to travel to Europe next summer.
